name: Halloween Dreamworld VR (DK2)
description:
The Story

You are a student who falls asleep doodling only to awaken all of your senses in this interactive (virtual reality) adventure. Immerse yourself in a spooky dream world and explore the mysteries hidden in the mist. Along the way, you encounter a cast of comically creepy creatures who hold the key to completing your quest. The truly brave may even dare to defy the laws of physics to reach new heights. A perfect mix of haunted and humorous, this game will appeal to all dreamers.

*note this game was created for the Oculus DK2. While it does work with the CV1, the game was desiged to run on much lower system requirments.
